notes.text:
This update for python-Werkzeug fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:

- CVE-2019-14806: Fixed the development server in Docker, the debugger security pin is now unique per container (bsc#1145383).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: Pallets Werkzeug before 0.15.3, when used with Docker, has insufficient debugger PIN randomness because Docker containers share the same machine id.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
